poker.model

Class AbstractPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • poker.model.AbstractPlayer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CallOrRaisePlayer, CallPlayer, FoldPlayer, RaisePlayer, RandomPlayer, UIPlayer

    public abstract class AbstractPlayer
extends java.lang.Object
    This abstract class is the basic class for any player that will be available in the game.
    • When starting a table the tableStarted(int) method will be called by the engine with the position of the player as argument.
    • While playing a hand the handStarted(int, GameState, Card[]) method will be called by the engine to inform the player about the new GameState and his new hole cards.
    • When it is the players turn the engine will call the getAction(int, GameState, Card[], int) until it received a valid action. As additional argument it contains the call size needed for calling.
    • If the hand is finished, the handFinished(int, GameState) will be called by the engine to inform the player about the new GameState after determining the winner of the old hand.
    • If there is only one player left on the table, the engine will call the tableFinished(int, Integer[]) method to inform all players on the table about the ranking.
    Author:
    Becker

    • Constructor Detail

      • AbstractPlayer

        public AbstractPlayer()
        Default constructor without arguments.

        The Poker Engine only uses your player's default constructor to create an instance, so make sure all initializing work is done here.

    • Method Detail

      • getAction

        public abstract Action getAction(int position,
               GameState gs,
               Card[] hand,
               int callSize)
        Returns the Action from the player for the current GameState and your Cards.
        Parameters:
        position - Your position.
        gs - The current GameState.
        hand - Your Cards.
        callSize - The chips needed to call.
        Returns:
        The Action from the player.
        See Also:
        Action, GameState, Card

      • tableStarted

        public void tableStarted(int position)
        This method is called when a new game has started.
        Parameters:
        position - Your position.

      • tableFinished

        public void tableFinished(int position,
                 java.lang.Integer[] ranking)
        This method is called when the game is finished.
        Parameters:
        position - Your position.
        ranking - The ranking from the last tournament. The first component in the Array contains the ID from the winner.

      • handStarted

        public void handStarted(int position,
               GameState gs,
               Card[] cards)
        This method is called when a new hand is started.
        Parameters:
        position - Your position.
        gs - The GameState after the hand.
        cards - Your new holecards.

      • handFinished

        public void handFinished(int position,
                GameState gs)
        This method is called when a hand is finished.
        Parameters:
        position - Your position.
        gs - The GameState after the hand.
